title: That Thing You Do
lyrics:
[drums]         | b xx -b x| b xx -b x|
[intro, kazoo] | (F) (Bbm) |
 
(F)You, (Bb)doin' that (C)thing you (F)do
(Bb)Breaking my (C)heart in(Dm)to a million (G)pieces
(Gm)Like you always (C)do
And (F)you, (Bb)don't mean (C)to be (F)cruel
You (Bb)never (C)even (Dm)knew about the (G)heartache
(Gm)I've been goin' (C)through
 
[chorus]
Well, I (Dm)try and try to for(G)get you girl
But it's (F)just so hard to (Bb)do
(F)Every time you (Bbm)do that thing you (F)do (C-C-C-C)
 
And (F)I, know (Bb)all the (C)games you (F)play
And I'm (Bb)gonna (C)find a (Dm)way to let you (G)know that
(Gm)You'll be mine some(C)day
Cause (F)we, could be (Bb)happy, (C)can't you (F)see
If you'd (Bb)only (C)let me (Dm)be the one to (G)hold you
And (Gm)keep you here with (C)me
 
[chorus again]
'Cause (Dm)I try and try to for(G)get you girl
But it's (F)just so hard to (Bb)do
(F)Every time you (Bbm)do that thing you (F)do (C-C-C-C)
 
(Bb)I don't ask a lot girl (I don’t ask a lot girl)
but I (Dm)know one thing's for sure (know one thing’s for sure)
It's the (G)love I haven't got girl
And I (C)just can't take it (D)anymore (C)whoa!
 
[instrumental, kazoo]
| (F) | (Bb) (C) |
| (F) | (Bb) (C) |
| (Dm) | (G) |
| (Gm) | (C) |
 
Cause (F)we, could be (Bb)happy, (C)can't you (F)see
If you'd (Bb)only (C)let me (Dm)be the one to (G)hold you
And (Gm)keep you here with (C)me
 
'Cause it (Dm)hurts me so just to (G)see you go
A(F)round with someone (Bb)new
And if (F)I know you, you're (Bb)doin' that thing
(F)Every day, just (Bb)doin' that thing
 
[outro]
(F)I can't take you (Bbm)doin' that thing you (F)do  (F-chachacha) [end]
